docs.text:
mkdocs-sequence-js-plugin MkDocs plugin to render js-sequence-diagrams blocks Usage plugins : - sequence-js : theme : simple|hand # diagram style popup : true # enable "click to zoom" diagram Example 1 ```sequence Andrew->China: Says Hello Note right of China: China thinks 
 about it China-->Andrew: How are you? Andrew->>China: I am good thanks! ``` Example 2 ```sequence Title: Here is a title A->B: Normal line B-->C: Dashed line C->>D: Open arrow D-->>A: Dashed open arrow ``` Example 3 ```sequence # Example of a comment. Note left of A: Note to the 
 left of A Note right of A: Note to the 
 right of A Note over A: Note over A Note over A,B: Note over both A and B ``` Example 4 ```sequence participant C participant B participant A Note right of A: By listing the participants 
 you can change their order ``` Author Francesco Saverio Cannizzaro (fcannizzaro)
docs.title: Plugin

docs.text: MkDocs plugin to render js-sequence-diagrams blocks
docs.title: mkdocs-sequence-js-plugin

docs.text: plugins : - sequence-js : theme : simple|hand # diagram style popup : true # enable "click to zoom" diagram
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: ```sequence Andrew->China: Says Hello Note right of China: China thinks \n about it China-->Andrew: How are you? Andrew->>China: I am good thanks! ```
docs.title: Example 1

docs.text: ```sequence Title: Here is a title A->B: Normal line B-->C: Dashed line C->>D: Open arrow D-->>A: Dashed open arrow ```
docs.title: Example 2

docs.text: ```sequence # Example of a comment. Note left of A: Note to the \n left of A Note right of A: Note to the \n right of A Note over A: Note over A Note over A,B: Note over both A and B ```
docs.title: Example 3

docs.text: ```sequence participant C participant B participant A Note right of A: By listing the participants \n you can change their order ```
docs.title: Example 4

docs.text: Dependencies This plugin depends on: Snap.svg Underscore.js js-sequence-diagrams Per Page Dependencies No diagrams in a page, No Dependencies loaded
